service1Text: Our courses are designed by world-renowned architects to challenge and inspire golfers of all levels.
service2Text: Relax and unwind in our luxurious clubhouse, complete with a pro shop, restaurant, and bar.
service3Text: Join our vibrant community and participate in a variety of social events and tournaments throughout the year.
testimonial1Text: "The best golf club I've ever been a member of. The courses are challenging, the staff is friendly, and the facilities are top-notch."
testimonial2Text: "I love the sense of community at Tiya Golf Club. I've made so many new friends and improved my game thanks to the excellent coaching staff."
testimonial3Text: "A truly world-class experience. I would recommend Tiya Golf Club to any serious golfer looking for a challenge."
aboutHistoryText1: Since 1984, Tiya is ranked #8 in the top 10 golf courses in the world. Tiya is Bootstrap 5 HTML CSS template for golf clubs. Anyone can modify and use this layout for commercial purposes.
aboutHistoryText2: Tiya Golf Club is 100% free CSS template provided by TemplateMo website. Please tell your friends about our website. Thank you for visiting.

visionText: To be the leading golf club in the region, providing a world-class experience for our members and guests.
missionText: To provide a premier golfing experience, while fostering a strong sense of community and a commitment to the environment.
